moves.name: cut
moves.effect: Inflicts regular damage with no additional effect.

moves.name: headbutt
moves.effect: Has a 30% chance to make the target flinch.

moves.name: body-slam
moves.effect: Has a 30% chance to paralyze the target.

moves.name: take-down
moves.effect: User receives 1/4 the damage it inflicts in recoil.

moves.name: roar
moves.effect: Immediately ends wild battles.  Forces trainers to switch Pok√©mon.

moves.name: flamethrower
moves.effect: Has a 10% chance to burn the target.

moves.name: hydro-pump
moves.effect: Inflicts regular damage with no additional effect.

moves.name: surf
moves.effect: Inflicts regular damage and can hit Dive users.
